profile.name: PIYUSH RAI
profile.title: Product Manager | Fintech & AI/ML | Digital Transformation & Data-Driven Strategy

summary: Product Management professional with 3.5+ years of experience driving digital transformation in the Banking and Financial Services sector. Proven success in building and scaling API-led digital products that reduced onboarding time by 80%, lowered transaction fallout rates by 70%, and increased client adoption by 30% YoY. Adept at defining product strategy, managing cross-functional delivery, and implementing KPI-driven decision frameworks. Skilled in leading end-to-end product strategy from ideation to execution, leveraging data, automation, and agile methodologies to enhance client experience and operational efficiency.

experience.description: Own product strategy and architecture for enterprise-grade API infrastructure powering digital payments and cash management flows (UPI, RTGS, NEFT, H2H).
bullets: Architected a Unified Digital Payments Platform (UDPP) consolidating 5+ legacy systems into a microservices-based orchestration layer enabling headless API initiation for corporate clients. Supporting high-volume transaction flows with 99.9% uptime.
Built and scaled a self-service API Developer Portal, reducing Time-to-First-Call from 1–2 weeks to <4 hours and driving 30% YoY growth in API-led client adoption.

Led legacy gateway decommissioning, migrating 800+ enterprise clients from SOAP-based infrastructure to RESTful APIs within 3 quarters, achieving zero downtime and full data integrity during transition.
Designed and rolled out real-time transaction monitoring dashboards, leveraging data-driven anomaly detection to enable faster root-cause analysis and reducing client complaints by 6% MoM.

Engineered a predictive transaction health framework (intelligent polling & anomaly detection), reducing transaction fallout rates by 70% and strengthening payment success metrics during partner bank downtimes.
Launched a DIY H2H onboarding platform (HTTPS/SFTP-based STP file transfers), enabling secure, scalable integrations for Bulk Payments.
Conceptualised and implemented an API monetisation engine ("Charge Master"), shifting from static pricing to volume-based tiering — unlocking new revenue streams and improving pricing transparency.
Created ROI models for strategic Products, using forecasting models and KPI benchmarking to drive data-driven investment decisions for new Projects.
Partnered with a 2,000+ member business team to analyse sales trends, client data, and adoption metrics, directly shaping the product roadmap and GTM strategy.

experience.description: Tech company offering engineering simulation software.
bullets: Debugged and optimized C++ source code modules in Hyperworks, improving reliability and system performance.

Automated identification of 200+ deprecated Hyperworks commands with Python, accelerating updates and ensuring seamless functionality.
Collaborated within a 10-member team using Perforce version control, streamlining code management and ensuring milestone alignment.
